### `0`

```

 lint/js/noExtraBooleanCast/reject/1/file.ts:1:4 lint/js/noExtraBooleanCast ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

  ✖ Avoid redundant double-negation.

    if (Boolean(foo)) {}
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ It is not necessary to use double-negation when a value will already be coerced to a boolean.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
```
